title: Montana Honorably Discharged Veteran Tuition Waiver (MUS)
summary: Last-dollar tuition waiver for eligible honorably discharged veterans attending Montana University System (MUS) campuses; covers tuition only (limitations apply).

requirements.notes: Calculated on in-state tuition; other grants/scholarships applied to tuition reduce the waiver; not available for some flat-fee courses (see fact sheet).

eligibilityNotes: Apply via AwardMontana / MUS process. Typically requires honorable discharge, Montana residency, and proof that VA education benefits were used and exhausted/expired (see campus guidance/fact sheet).

title: Montana National Guard Tuition Waiver (MUS)
summary: Tuition waiver for eligible Montana National Guard members attending eligible Montana postsecondary institutions (MUS campuses and community colleges).

requirements.notes: Eligibility criteria and participating institutions are listed in MUS program documentation.

eligibilityNotes: Guard members apply under the MUS/OCHE process; tuition waiver applies per program rules and only at eligible institutions.

title: Montana National Guard Waiver Overview (ApplyMontana)
summary: Program overview and eligibility checklist for the Montana National Guard tuition waiver.
eligibilityNotes: Use this page as a quick eligibility reference and to find the official application flow links.

title: Montana FWP Disabled/Combat-Disabled Hunting & Fishing Licenses (Selected Programs)
summary: Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks (FWP) provides certain discounted license options for qualifying combat-disabled veterans (limited quantities/eligibility rules apply).

requirements.notes: See FWP rules for combat-disabled eligibility and annual application windows/limits.

eligibilityNotes: Review FWP eligibility criteria and submit the relevant annual application(s) for the specific program/license.
